testcase.name: test

error.message:
### Error querying database. Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 479 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 476 milliseconds ago. ### The error may exist in com/hhf/dao/UserMapper.xml ### The error may involve com.hhf.dao.UserDao.getUserList ### The error occurred while executing a query ### Cause: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 479 milliseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 476 milliseconds ago.
